plot: In this pilot for a proposed NBC comedy series, scientist Lester Belstrip invents a machine which forces people to tell the truth.
title: The Big Brain
plot_es: In this pilot for a proposed NBC comedy series, scientist Lester Belstrip invents a machine which forces people to tell the truth.
plot_en: In this pilot for a proposed NBC comedy series, scientist Lester Belstrip invents a machine which forces people to tell the truth.
